title: Blood, Blood Everywhere
description: FROM THE AUTHOR THAT BROUGHT YOU ELIAS ZAPPLE'S BOOK OF SLUGS...  NICU - THE LITTLEST VAMPIRE IN 'BLOOD, BLOOD EVERYWHERE' Nine year-old Florin is a thirsty vampire. The reason? Most of his blood has been sucked out by his friend, Nicu. Florin rampages through the town of Biertan, drinking as much blood as he can. Soon everyone in Biertan is low on blood, and seeking revenge on all vampires. Nicu faces a big challenge. Keeping Florin in check and stopping the angry townspeople from killing vampires.  >>>>Another really AMAZING book from Elias Zapple. ELIAS ZAPPLE  MEET FLORIN - A THIRSTY VAMPIRE WITH A BIG BELLY Get to know Florin, a greedy vampire living in the Carpathian Mountains of Transylvania, Romania. See how he drinks and drinks and puts the 'lives' of all vampires in danger.   FIND OUT IF NICU CAN STOP FLORIN  Written in a light-hearted, humorous and Zappley way, Nicu - The Littlest Vampire in 'Blood, Blood Everywhere' contains a strong message about addiction and its consequences.  MANGA ILLUSTRATIONS THROUGHOUT Illustrated by Reimarie Cabalu
author: Elias Zapple
